const Whatever = ({ id, note, date, time }) => { const [anote, setAnote] = useState({ note }); const [adate, setAdate] = useState({ date }); const [atime, setAtime] = useState({ time }); function updateNote(e) { setAnote(e.target.value); } function updateDate(e) { setAdate(e.target.value); } function updateTime(e) { setAtime(e.target.value); } function updateEdit() { add(function (prevData) { return [{ id, note, date, time }, ...prevData]; }); } return (
